columns.name: name
columns.description: The name that identifies the server certificate.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the server certificate.

columns.name: server_certificate_id
columns.description: The stable and unique string identifying the server certificate.

columns.name: expiration
columns.description: The date on which the certificate is set to expire.

columns.name: certificate_body
columns.description: The contents of the public key certificate.

columns.name: certificate_body_length
columns.description: The contents of the public key certificate.

columns.name: certificate_chain
columns.description: The contents of the public key certificate chain.

columns.name: path
columns.description: The path to the server certificate.

columns.name: upload_date
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the account that is designated as the management account for the organization

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached with the resource.
